item.title: How Will RFK’s Cuts At The CDC, FDA And NIH Affect You?
item.description: OMB plans cuts of $40 billion to HHS. The NIH and CDC will each face reductions of more than 40%. What will you see when this happens?

item.title: Could 2025 Represent a Near-Term Peak in AI Capex?
item.description: Technology investment surges are exhilarating and fun. But AI capital spending is above the long-term mean and likely to pull back.
